content: CFS-CC Firestop cable collar Solution for renovation of sealed cable penetrations with 100% fill ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop collars, wraps and bandages- - - ### FEATURES:Features Suitable for new or existing single and bundled cables in floors and walls Re-penetrable to allow future increases in cable capacity Suitable for openings of max. 4 or 108 mm in diameter (sleeved or un-sleeved) Simple and clean – sealant-free, no backfilling material required and low VOCs Problem solver – suitable for bending cables, cables close to the wall/floor and edge applications (half collar) Applications Single and bundled cables in floors and walls New and existing cable installations Membrane penetrations Certain coaxial cables, conduit and conduit bundles, split-type air conditioner applications and smoke guide pipes Bending cables and cables close to the wall/floor For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 5.4 g/l Diameter: 5-29/32 in Storage and transportation temperature range: 23 - 104 °F Technical Data | LEED VOC | 5.4 g/l | Diameter | 5-29/32 in | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Application temperature range | 40 - 104 °F | Temperature resistance range | 5 - 140 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2065421 - Firestop cable collar CFS-CC 4 (qty 2) - Package Size 2 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-CC Firestop collar - 3507361 - Firestop cable collar CFS-CC 4 (qty 56) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 56x CFS-CC Firestop collar
